effect.Name: Animeish (Switch)
effect.description: Shader changes to an anime styled look.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Animeish (Switch) Shader | 1.0 (20.07.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader changes to an anime styled look.

parameter.name: ( Rendering Options )
parameter.description: Here are the options for how the texture should be rendered.

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable determines what the base should be. Setting it to 0 sets the base as the texture of the object on which the effect is applied, and setting it to 1 sets this as the background.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Color Steps
parameter.description: This change sets how many levels of brightness there should be for a given color. A setting value of 255 gives no effect. (Range from 0 to 255)

parameter.name: Saturation
parameter.description: This variable changes the color saturation. (Range from 0 to 100)

parameter.name: ( Shadow Options )
parameter.description: Here are the variables for shadow which changes the base color.

parameter.name: Shadow Threshold
parameter.description: This variable determines at which brightness level the shadow color should be displayed. (Range from 0 to 1)

parameter.name: Shadow Alpha
parameter.description: This variable determines how visible the shadow should be. (Range from 0 to 1)

parameter.name: ( Outline Options )
parameter.description: Here are the variables for outline.

parameter.name: Outline Color
parameter.description: This variable sets what color the outline should be.

parameter.name: Outline Threshold
parameter.description: This variable sets the sensitivity for edge detection. Lower values will make the outline appear more easily, while higher values require stronger edges to be detected. (Range from 0 to 1)

parameter.name: Outline Anti-aliasing
parameter.description: This variable determines how smooth the outline should be. (Range from 0 to 1)

parameter.name: Outline Scale
parameter.description: This variable sets the thickness of the outline.

parameter.name: Outline Alpha
parameter.description: This variable sets the alpha color of the outline. (Range from 0 to 1)
